title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Chumash Cultural Journey
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Park Fun     Chumash Cultural Journey                 Cultural Journey        (object placeholder)  Â    This interactive program explores different parts of cultures and it is for all ages! Visit the past with ATOM, the Automated Time Observation Machine; learn about ancient tools that still appear in your world today; listen to the sounds of the past; and play music.  To begin, you may be wondering: What is culture? What are the different elements that make cultures different?   Visit a Chumash Village 250 Years Ago   Rediscover the past with ATOM What kinds of clothes did the Chumash wear? See the parts of a Chumash Village See Chumash Tools What was the most important animal to the Chumash more than 250 years agao? Play traditional Chumash musical instruments. What did the morning sound like in a Chumash village? What did the night sound like in a Chumash village? Play an ancient game that the Chumash still play today?
